index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's Bonus Community Development Block Grant Discretionary Award which is part of the City's Community Development Block Grant Program for the Grant Program Year March 1, 1979 through September 30, 1980; accepting financial assistance from the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; authorizing the Director of the Department of Community Development to enter into such agreements as may be necessary for the effectuation of said program; establishing a subaccount in the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund to facilitate operation of the 1979 Bonus Block Grant Program; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
